prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The impact of generative AI is expected to be far-reaching, affecting virtually every sector of human activity. This technological shift will likely create both winners and losers as industries adapt.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: generative AI, impact, far-reaching, sectors, human activity, technological shift, winners, losers, industries, adapt
